project_descr: BRA/14/010 - “Brazil & Africa: fighting poverty and empowering women via South-South Cooperation”

outputs.output_descr: Strengthened public policies planning in Mozambique through promotion of the MDGs 3 (gender equality and empower women),4 (reduce child mortality) and 5 (improve maternal health)

Project governance, which shall be ensured by UNDP as leading UN Agency in this project. Activities includes project coordination and follow-up but including a mission with the participation of ABC as coordinating Agency for the Brazilian Government
Increased capacities in African Low Income Countries (LICs) to promote gender equality and the empowerment of women and girls inspired by relevant Brazilian experiences.

Outcome 1.	Increased and improved knowledge-sharing and learning in African Low Income Countries (LICs) on the design and implementation of social development/social protection programmes inspired by relevant Brazilian public policies
Improved Monitoring and Evaluation of social development/protection programmes in Nigeria, as a result of the technical capacity development supported by the project.
